attributes.action: Let school student express themselves without being denied education.
attributes.additional_details: So that kids don’t have to miss out on education because of the way they want to express themselves.
attributes.background: I would like them to have a discussion with schools the matter of children having coloured hair, makeup and piercings, and help to remove these unnecessary rules.

rejection.details:
The UK Government does not set rules about student appearance. This is a matter for individual schools.

We have accepted the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban mandatory uniforms in state schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550875

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to ban schools from setting any rules about student appearance, if that is what you want to happen.
